lead_paragraph: In the 2007 Fiesta Bowl, Boise State showed the tenacity of an underdog and pulled out a victory that resonated more than any other this decade.
snippet: In the 2007 Fiesta Bowl, Boise State showed the tenacity of an underdog and pulled out a victory that resonated more than any other this decade.

headline.main: Using Trickery to Burst Into Our Consciousness
headline.seo: Using Trickery, Boise State Bursts Into Consciousness
headline.print_headline: Using Trickery to Burst Into Our Consciousness
